WorkItem.Description:
In the lastest release, WPP prevent user to publish update if the certificate is invalid.
Some users, use a ~Vaild~ certificate that is judge invalid by .Net Framework, but work well with Wsus.

Add an option to bypass certificate validation.
Using this option, __WILL NOT__ make a real invalid certificate working with Wsus.
WorkItem.Summary: Certificate Validation prevent publishing updates event if the certificate is ~Valid~
